description: This file defines a template class 'OptionalType' within the WPEFramework::Core namespace, implementing an optional value container similar to std::optional. It provides methods for setting, clearing, and comparing optional values, as well as type conversion operators.

classes.name: OptionalType
classes.description: A template class that encapsulates an optional value of the specified type, supporting assignment, comparison, and presence checks.

methods.name: OptionalType()
methods.description: Constructor that initializes the optional value as unset.

methods.name: OptionalType(const TYPE& value)
methods.description: Constructor that initializes the optional value with a given value and marks it as set.

methods.name: OptionalType(const OptionalType<TYPE>& value)
methods.description: Copy constructor that copies the value and set status from another OptionalType.

methods.name: ~OptionalType()
methods.description: Destructor.

methods.name: operator=(const OptionalType<TYPE>& value)
methods.description: Copy assignment operator.

methods.name: operator=(const TYPE& value)
methods.description: Assigns a value of TYPE to the optional, marking it as set.

methods.name: operator==(const TYPE& value) const
methods.description: Compares the stored value with the provided value.

methods.name: operator==(const OptionalType<TYPE>& value) const
methods.description: Checks if both OptionalType instances are set and contain equal values.

methods.name: operator!=(const TYPE& value) const
methods.description: Checks if the stored value is not equal to the provided value.

methods.name: operator!=(const OptionalType<TYPE>& value) const
methods.description: Checks if OptionalType instances are not equal.

methods.name: IsSet() const
methods.description: Returns true if the optional contains a value.

methods.name: Clear()
methods.description: Clears the stored value and marks the optional as unset.

methods.name: operator TYPE&()
methods.description: Type conversion operator to obtain a mutable reference to the stored value.

methods.name: operator const TYPE&() const
methods.description: Type conversion operator to obtain a const reference to the stored value.

methods.name: Value()
methods.description: Returns a mutable reference to the stored value.

methods.name: Value() const
methods.description: Returns a const reference to the stored value.

methods.name: void Clear()
methods.description: unavailable

methods.name: bool IsSet() const
methods.description: unavailable

methods.name: OptionalType(const OptionalType<TYPE> & value)
methods.description: unavailable

methods.name: OptionalType(const TYPE & value)
methods.description: unavailable

methods.name: TYPE & Value()
methods.description: unavailable

methods.name: const TYPE & Value() const
methods.description: unavailable

methods.name: bool operator !=(const OptionalType<TYPE> & value) const
methods.description: unavailable

methods.name: bool operator !=(const TYPE & value) const
methods.description: unavailable

methods.name: OptionalType<TYPE> & operator =(const OptionalType<TYPE> & value)
methods.description: unavailable

methods.name: OptionalType<TYPE> & operator =(const TYPE & value)
methods.description: unavailable

methods.name: bool operator ==(const OptionalType<TYPE> & value) const
methods.description: unavailable

methods.name: bool operator ==(const TYPE & value) const
methods.description: unavailable

ctags.name: operator !=
ctags.pattern: /^        inline bool operator!=(const OptionalType<TYPE>& value) const$/

ctags.name: operator !=
ctags.pattern: /^        inline bool operator!=(const TYPE& value) const$/

ctags.name: operator ==
ctags.pattern: /^        inline bool operator==(const OptionalType<TYPE>& value) const$/

ctags.name: operator ==
ctags.pattern: /^        inline bool operator==(const TYPE& value) const$/
